SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller

Class SelfRelatedController

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.SelfRelatedController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/self") public class SelfRelatedController extends Object
Controller for handling user-related operations. This class provides endpoints for retrieving and updating user information.
